## Resolver sistema de ecuaciones
**Flujo de calles**

```{r}
sistema <- matrix(
  c(1,0,0,0,0,1,0,1300,
    1,-1,0,0,0,0,1,200,
    0,1,0,0,-1,0,0,200,
    0,0,0,-1,1,0,0,400,
    0,0,1,-1,0,0,1,100,
    0,0,1,0,0,1,0,600),
  nrow = 6, ncol = 8, byrow = TRUE
  )

sistema
rref(sistema)
```
